name: Zen Pond Life
description:
Zen Pond Life by Liam Twose.

Explore the pond, breathing life as you fly.

CONTROLS:

  • Space (auto-fly to next lilypad)
  • Arrow Keys
  • WASD
  • Touch / Mouse

CREDITS:

  1. 'Pond Life' Music by Christer Kaitila: https://twitter.com/mcfunkypants
  2. Sound Effects and Music by Eric Matyas: www.soundimage.org
  3. Water texture by Aswin Vos: https://opengameart.org/users/aswin909
  4. Lotus flowers by Gostay: https://opengameart.org/users/yurinikolai
  5. Lilypad by Yuri Nikolai: https://opengameart.org/users/yurinikolai

Available Free On:

  • Windows 32/64bit
  • Linux 32/64 bit (experimental - untested)
  • MacOSX (experimental - untested)
